articles.title: 'Kick the b******s out!' Ukrainian millionaire orders home to be bombed as Russia moves in - Express
articles.description: UKRAINIAN millionaire Andrey Stavnitser chose to bomb his own mansion so it could not be taken over by Russians when they move into occupied areas of his country.

articles.title: Lizzo Joked About Being Pregnant With Chris Evans' Baby In Her Hilarious "SNL" Monologue - BuzzFeed
articles.description: "I have no idea where that one started."
articles.content:

Lizzo actually did make history later in the show, as SNL's first-ever musical guest to introduce herself.
